attributes.additional_details: To create fairness in the economy and recognise the contribution people of the age of 16 have towards it .
attributes.background: Debate this in the House of Commons, and come to a decision.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Lower the voting age to 16:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/642894

We can also only accept petitions that include the petition-creator's full name.
